name: FAR AWAY (Hortense)
description:
You are an astronaut named Buzz, who was sent into space on November 11, 1966 to help repair a space station orbiting the Earth, damaged by an asteroid.

You've been on the station for some time now, and you are starting to equip yourself to access the surface. After a few hours, you can weld the hull with your "Blaster Sodial" gun.

Suddenly, you watch a piece of station debris pass a few feet away from you, you look behind you and see a cloud of debris moving towards you. You understand that time is running out. You hurry back to the platform and take one of the last rescue ships. But, as you launch, a piece of debris hits you and propels you away from Earth. You drift and crash into Mars.

After a few minutes lying down, you regain consciousness and you discover the drama produced by the landing. After patching up your suit, you realize that the oxygen level is dropping, time is precious. You look around, seeing flames far away; Is it the rest of the ship? You decide to go there when, suddenly, aliens come towards you. You grab your gun and decide to run at full speed to the rest of the ship for oxygen.

Will you be able to survive while your oxygen is depleted?
